Module nl.naturalis.common

Package nl.naturalis.common.io

Basic I/O utilities.
Author:
Ayco Holleman
  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    ArraySwapOutputStream
    A SwapOutputStream that uses a byte array as internal buffer.
    DeflatedArraySwapOutputStream
    A SwapOutputStream that compresses the data as it enters the internal buffer.
    DeflatedNioSwapOutputStream
    A SwapOutputStream that compresses the data as it enters the internal buffer.
    NioSwapOutputStream
    A SwapOutputStream implementation based on the java.nio package.
    REZipOutputStream
    An alternative to ZipOutputStream that lets you write multiple zip entries at the same time.
    REZipOutputStream.Builder
    A builder class for REZipOutputStream instances.
    SwapOutputStream
    An OutputStream that allows allows you to read back the data that were written to it.
